channel.title: Posts on After Dark Cabaret
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on After Dark Cabaret

item.title: Cast-Only Site Deployed
item.description: A private version of this site has been published to allow the staff to communicate and share with the cast. The username and password can be obtained from a member of production staff and will be provided to all confirmed cast members. Cast only cabaret site

item.title: Audition Information
item.description: ABOUT THE SITE: This page is not meant to duplicate the Everett’s audition page. The canonical source for audition info is https://www.everetttheatre.com/upcoming-auditions/after-dark-cabaret. This page will be the landing page for the cast of the After Dark Cabaret to get info on schedule and notes. For now, read about our audition process! ABOUT THE SHOW The After Dark Cabaret is a chance to perform a variety of show-tunes that are intended for a mature audience.

item.title: Set List Preview
item.description: Trying to pick out the perfect audition song for our cabaret? Here is a preview playlist of songs we have chosen for the show and are looking to cast. Feel free to pick something from this list, or bring something of your own! Weâ€™re looking for performers to cast into prechosen group numbers. We will likely add a handful more to this list, inspired by auditions. Spotify Cabaret Playlist

item.title: Rehearsal Schedule
item.description: Our rehearsals are likely going to be on Mondays and Thursdays from 6:30-9:30 and Saturday afternoons. We will organize our rehearsals around Heather’s, to allow performers to do both. First rehearsal will be May 26th. Stay tuned for more!
